quotes.message: What may be done at any time will be done at no time.
quotes.name: Scottish Proverb

quotes.message: Good things happen when you get your priorities straight.
quotes.name: Scott Caan

quotes.message: Lack of time is actually lack of priorities.
quotes.name: Timothy Ferris

quotes.message: What seems so necessary today may not even be desirable tomorrow.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.message: Things which matter most must never be at the mercy of things which matter least.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Most of us spend too much time on what is urgent and not enough time on what is important.
quotes.name: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.message: It is not a daily increase, but a daily decrease. Hack away at the inessentials.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: The mark of a great man is one who knows when to set aside the important things in order to accomplish the vital ones.
quotes.name: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.message: The Principle of Priority states (a) you must know the difference between what is urgent and what is important, and (b) you must do what's important first.
quotes.name: Steven Pressfield

quotes.message: I learned that we can do anything, but we can't do everything... at least not at the same time. So think of your priorities not in terms of what activities you do, but when you do them. Timing is everything.
quotes.name: Dan Millman

quotes.message: The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.
quotes.name: Stephen Covey

quotes.message: Decide what you want, decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work.
quotes.name: H. L. Hunt

quotes.message: Sometimes when you're overwhelmed by a situation - when you're in the darkest of darkness - that's when your priorities are reordered.
quotes.name: Phoebe Snow

quotes.message: Nobody's life is ever all balanced. It's a conscious decision to choose your priorities every day.
quotes.name: Elisabeth Hasselbeck

quotes.message: We don't drift in good directions. We discipline and prioritize ourselves there.
quotes.name: Andy Stanley

quotes.message: Living in light of eternity changes your priorities.
quotes.name: Rick Warren

quotes.message: Always concentrate on the most valuable use of your time. This is what separates the winners from the losers.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.name: John Wooden

quotes.message: Doing more things faster is no substitute for doing the right things.
quotes.name: Stephen Covey

quotes.message: Forget about likes and dislikes. They are of no consequence. Just do what must be done. This may not be happiness, but it is greatness.
quotes.name: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.message: Do the hard jobs first. The easy jobs will take care of themselves.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: The life you have left is a gift. Cherish it. Enjoy it now, to the fullest. Do what matters, now.
quotes.name: Leo Babauta

quotes.message: The most important thing in life is knowing the most important things in life.
quotes.name: David F. Jakielo

quotes.message: Desires dictate our priorities, priorities shape our choices, and choices determine our actions.
quotes.name: Dallin H. Oaks

quotes.message: You have to decide what your highest priorities are and have the courage?pleasantly, smilingly, nonapologetically, to say ?no? to other things.
quotes.name: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.message: Set aside time to plan how you will spend your time. Think about what's most important. Then do those things first.
quotes.name: Frank Bettger

quotes.message: Do the duty which lies nearest to you. The second duty will then become clearer.
quotes.name: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.message: The older I get the more wisdom I find in the ancient rule of taking first things first. A process which often reduces the most complex human problem to a manageable proportion.
quotes.name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.message: No one is going to hand you an organizational chart. You have to hand it to yourself.
quotes.name: Robert Genn

quotes.message: Wise are those who learn that the bottom line doesn't always have to be their top priority.
quotes.name: William Arthur Ward

quotes.message: The only thing a cat worries about is what's happening right now. As we tell the kittens, you can only wash one paw at a time.
quotes.name: Lloyd Alexander

quotes.message: Perpetual devotion to what a man calls his business, is only to be sustained by perpetual neglect of many other things.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: Not everything that can be counted counts, and not everything that counts can be counted.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: You can't move so fast that you try to change the mores faster than people can accept it. That doesn't mean you do nothing, but it means that you do the things that need to be done according to priority.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: Whatever is at the center of our life will be the source of our security, guidance, wisdom, and power.
quotes.name: Stephen Covey

quotes.message: The necessary has never been man s top priority.The passionate pursuit of the nonessential and the extravagant is one of the chief traits of human uniqueness.
quotes.name: Eric Hoffer

quotes.message: Sometimes one pays most for the things one gets for nothing.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Learn how to separate the majors and the minors. A lot of people don't do well simply because they major in minor things.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: Besides the noble art of getting things done, there is the noble art of leaving things undone. The wisdom in life consists in the elimination of non-essentials.
quotes.name: Lin Yu Tang

quotes.message: When we re forced to do something, suddenly the time is there. Which means it s there all the time, but we ve just chosen to limit ourselves by believing that it isn t.
quotes.name: Jen Sincero

quotes.message: When you know what's most important to you, making a decision is quite simple.
quotes.name: Anthony Robbins

quotes.message: The greatest reflection of your priorities is your time. Whatever you say about what matters to you, the true test is where you place your time.
quotes.name: Nick Crocker

quotes.message: The reason most goals are not achieved is that we spend our time doing second things first.
quotes.name: Robert J. McKain

quotes.message: Our days are like identical suitcases. Even though they are all the same size, some people area able to pack more into them then others. The reason? They know what to pack.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: It is very sad for a man to make himself servant to a single thing; his manhood all taken out of him by the hydraulic pressure of excessive business.
quotes.name: Theodore Parker

quotes.message: Priority is a function of context.
quotes.name: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.message: If you continually ask yourself, 'What's important now'' you won't waste time on the trivial.
quotes.name: Lou Holtz

quotes.message: You will never find time for anything. If you want time, you must make it.
quotes.name: Charles Bixton

quotes.message: Never allow someone to be your priority while allowing yourself to be their option.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: If the ladder is not leaning against the right wall, every step we take just gets us to the wrong place faster.
quotes.name: Stephen Covey

quotes.message: To change your life you need to change your priorities.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: Sometimes things in life happen that allow us to understand our priorities very clearly. Ultimately you can see those as gifts.
quotes.name: Mariska Hargitay

quotes.message: Decide what your priorities are and how much time you'll spend on them. If you don't, someone else will.
quotes.name: Harvey Mackay

quotes.message: When we put God first, all other things fall into their proper place or drop out of our lives.
quotes.name: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.message: There can be no happiness if the things we believe in are different from the things we do.
quotes.name: Freya Stark

quotes.message: Pick battles big enough to matter, small enough to win.
quotes.name: Jonathan Kozol

quotes.message: Sometimes it's the smallest decisions that can change your life forever.
quotes.name: Keri Russell

quotes.message: It is the mark of great people to treat trifles as trifles and important matters as important.
quotes.name: Doris Lessing
